question: Who has been appointed the new Chairperson of National Commission for Protection of Child Rights (NCPCR)?
explanation: Priyank Kanoongo has been appointed the new Chairperson of National Commission for Protection of Child Rights (NCPCR) for a period of 3 years. The post of chairperson fell vacant after Stuti Kacker\'s tenure ended on September 16, 2018. The NCPCR is a statutory body,  which was set up by an Act of Parliament in 2007 under the Commissions for Protection of Child Rights Act, 2005.
